thread.title: Hanover Park K-9 unit among top dogs
thread.title_full: Hanover Park K-9 unit among top dogs

author: Daily Herald report
title: Hanover Park K-9 unit among top dogs
text:
Hanover Park Police Department's K-9 unit is polling well in an annual contest that uses an online vote to give $5,000 to a police department to create or maintain a K-9 program.
The contest is put on by Aftermath , a nationwide company that specializes in crime scene and biohazard clean up. Voting at www.aftermath.com/k9contest closes on Oct. 31, and the winner will be announced Nov. 3.
Voters who include a photo of their department or their department's K-9 with their ballot will have their vote counted twice. Hanover Park currently has one K-9 unit.
 News Hanover Park Pets and Animals
